articles.author: Jennifer Newton
articles.title: Hong Kong, Paris and Zurich are the world's most expensive cities and Damascus is cheapest - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers looked at the prices of 138 products and services - including food, drink, clothing and household supplies in around 130 cities worldwide - to draw up the ranking.
articles.content:
Hong Kong, Paris and Zurich are the world's most expensive cities, a new survey has found.
